content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Maria. I appreciate your interest. May I ask what your budget is for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 700 Euro
I agree to the price of 650 Euro.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I see, well 650 Euro is certainly a fair price for this apartment. Thank you for agreeing to my terms. I believe this will be a mutually beneficial arrangement. Let's move forward with the lease agreement and get this started.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 650 Euro.
I am Maria Mamani from Bolivia.
I am a student.
I am dependable and responsible.
I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
I am interested in the apartment located on 123 Main Street.
I agree to the terms and conditions of this lease agreement.
I will pay 650 Euro per month for the rental of this apartment.
I will sign the lease agreement and pay the first month's rent of 650 Euro upon signing.
I will move in on 1st of next month.
I agree to the following terms:
- I will not sublet the apartment or allow anyone else to live in the apartment without the landlord's prior written consent.
- I will not make any changes to the apartment without the landlord's prior written consent.
- I will pay all rent and utilities in a timely manner.
- I will not cause any damage to the apartment or its contents.
- I will leave the apartment in the same condition as it was when I moved in, except for normal wear and tear.
I will provide the landlord with a copy of my passport and proof of my student status.
I will provide the landlord with a copy of my rental agreement and proof of payment of the first month's rent.
I will provide the landlord with a copy of my contact information.
I will provide the landlord with a copy of the lease agreement upon signing.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for the detailed information, Maria. I appreciate your willingness to sign the lease agreement and pay the first month's rent of 650 Euro upon signing. I will provide you with a copy of the lease agreement for you to review before signing.

It's great to hear that you are a responsible and dependable tenant, and I look forward to our positive working relationship. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before you sign the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
